body_html:
I just got this same error with 0.1.12. Can this be fixed/reopened? I'd rather not use conda...

pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.1.12.post1-cp35-cp35m-linux_x86_64.whl

I'm using python 3.5
